rajaya apahasuthawayata path kirima sandaha dushana chodana idiripath karana wipakshaya owun balaye sitiyadi katayuthu kala aakaraya janathawata mathaka thibe.sthri dushakayin nidahas kala je aar ge pakshaye kisiwekutath duminda silwa gana prashna kirime ayithiyak natha.adhyapanaye dhawala pathrikawa gena aa wipaksha nayakawaraya pramukha wipakshaya pudgalika wishwawidyalawalata wiruddhawa handa nagima wihiluwaki.chinayen aanayanaya kala samajawadaya karapinnagena sitina jewipi ya china aadharawalata wiruddha wima prahasanayak nowanneda?
